mapper.select: select sum(price*qty) as sales, to_char(logtime,'YYYY-MM-DD') as logtime from orderandsales where status=3 group by to_char(logtime,'YYYY-MM-DD') order by logtime
select count(*) as count, mainSubject from orderandsales join product using(productCode) where status=3 group by mainSubject order by count desc
